EmailTemplate.name: Annual Report - Original Signature
EmailTemplate.subject: Annual Report - Fax Signature
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SUBJECT LINE: Your LegalZoom Order# XXXXXXXX - URGENT ACTION REQUIRED Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your Annual Report order. In order to ensure your order is processed as quickly as possible, please follow the steps listed below. > Do not make any changes to the attached Annual Report as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Support. > Print two (2) copies of the document on white paper using black ink only. > Sign where indicated > Mail the documents to our address listed below. Please note that we cannot accept faxes as the state office will only accept original signed documents. Courier Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd. 10th Flr.
Glendale, CA 91203 USPS Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd., 10th Flr. POB 29096 Glendale, CA 91203 If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our Customer Support at (800) 773-0888 or customercare@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service. {!snippetVariable.ccsincerely} {!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website} This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717. Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book. This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
